title: Ticket #663: Document how DAGMan handles multi-job clusters
description: Igor had questions about this, said he couldn't find anything about the semantics (one failed job -> failed cluster, etc.).
remarks:
2009-Aug-31 11:01:41 by smoler:
The documentation missing relates to what value of $RETURN is handed off to a POST script for a node in which the Condor job is actually a cluster of multiple jobs. Each of the jobs within the cluster generates a return value, but the POST script only gets one $RETURN value. The question is WHICH one?

2009-Sep-01 10:39:01 by smoler:
Documentation appended in 7.3.2 manual.
creator: wenger
